reporting-org.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross

title.narrative: ICRC operations by the Caracas (regional) Delegation(2020 Unaudited)

description.narrative: The ICRC Caracas delegation also covers Aruba, Bonaire, Curacao and Trinidad and Tobago. It promotes IHL and international standards of the use of force with the armed forces and police, supports the National Societies in the region, and, in Venezuela, implements activities to strengthen health personnel in weapon wounded management while working with communities affected by violence.>> More on the work of the ICRC's Caracas delegation (in Spanish)
